# Task 03 — Timeline playback indicator + scrubbing

## Summary

Add a visual indicator of current playback position (e.g., dot on the timeline) and allow scrubbing by dragging/tapping.

## Requirements

- Indicator updates as audio plays.
- Scrub interaction maps Y position → timestamp and sets `audio.currentTime`.

## Acceptance Criteria

- Indicator tracks playback accurately.
- Scrubbing changes playback position.

## How to Test

- Manual: play audio and scrub; verify position changes.

## Dependencies

- phase-3/02-timeline-structure-and-sections.md
